revision.text:
==Details==
===Uses=== The farm is a place that you can plant [[Berries]] that when harvested will give you Money and [[Farming Points]]. It can be upgraded to open more plots that allow you to plant more berries. The farm is unlocked by having the [[Wailmer pail]], which is given to you when you unlock Route 14.
===Upgrades===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Plots !!
